content:
| Command | Use |
| --- | --- |
| /ask | Get an answer to a question. |
| /blend | Easily blend two images together. |
| /daily\_theme | Toggle notification pings for the #daily-theme channel update. |
| /fast | Switch to Fast mode. |
| /help | Shows helpful basic information and tips about the Midjourney Bot. |
| /imagine | Generate an image using a prompt. |
| /info | View information about your account and any queued or running jobs. |
| /stealth | For Pro Plan Subscribers: switch to Stealth Mode. |
| /public | For Pro Plan Subscribers: switch to Public Mode. |
| /subscribe | Generate a personal link for a user's account page. |
| /settings | View and adjust the Midjourney Bot's settings. |
| /prefer option | Create or manage a custom option. |
| /prefer option list | View your current custom options. |
| /prefer suffix | Specify a suffix to add to the end of every prompt. |
| /show | Use an images Job ID to regenerate within Discord. |
| /relax | Switch to Relax mode. |
| /remix | Toggle Remix mode. |
| /private (deprecated) | Replaced with '/stealth'. |
| /pixels (deprecated) |  |
| /idea (deprecated) |  |

| Setting | Use |
| --- | --- |
| MJ Version 1 | Sets the Model Versions used for jobs. |
| MJ Version 2 | Sets the Model Versions used for jobs. |
| MJ Version 3 | Sets the Model Versions used for jobs. |
| MJ Version 4 | Sets the Model Versions used for jobs. |
| Niji Mode |  |
| MJ Test |  |
| MJ Test Photo |  |
| Half Quality | Sets the Quality Parameter used for jobs. |
| Base Quality | Sets the Quality Parameter used for jobs. |
| High Quality (2x cost) | Sets the Quality Parameter used for jobs. |
| Style Low | Sets the Stylize Parameter used for jobs. |
| Style Med | Sets the Stylize Parameter used for jobs. |
| Style High | Sets the Stylize Parameter used for jobs. |
| Style Very High | Sets the Stylize Parameter used for jobs. |
| Regular Upscale | Sets the Upscaler used for jobs. |
| Light Upscale | Sets the Upscaler used for jobs. |
| Beta Upscale | Sets the Upscaler used for jobs. |
| Public | Switch between Public and Stealth modes. |
| Stealth | Switch between Public and Stealth modes. |
| Remix | Switch to Remix mode. |
| Fast | Switch between Fast and Relaxed modes. |
| Relax | Switch between Fast and Relaxed modes. |

| Custom Preference | Use |
| --- | --- |
| /prefer auto\_dm | Completed Jobs are automatically sent to Direct Message. |
| /prefer option set <name> <value> | Creates a custom parameter that you can use to add multiple parameters to the end of prompts quickly. |
| /prefer option list | List all options created with prefer option set. Users can have up to 20 custom options. |
| /prefer suffix | Automatically appends the specified suffix |
